wikipedia_page.main: Nayef Rashed (born 1949) is a Middle-Eastern actor living in the United Kingdom. After training at London's Drama Centre, he has appeared in such television favourites as Only Fools and Horses, The Bill, and feature films such as Navy Seals. He appeared in the film Salmon Fishing in the Yemen as the Rebel Leader.
